title: Well that's hilarious haha.
body:
So just went to log onto my main, perma-banned.

Apparently Riot has more than enough time to stroll through the boards and perma-ban this account because i mentioned im trolling on another account  to show the systems dont work (dont worry boys the account im trolling on is alive and kicking and its 3 days in)

But doesnt have the time to fix their report system.

Meh their loss considering im a regular customer, ill just play F2P using the hexchest system and roll a new account now.

But considering this account is banned and I no longer need to worry about the name and shame issue, here is an extremely tenacious fellow from my small list of "people who get reported in literally every game they play but havnt been banned in almost 2 years"

GeneralSarcasm

Real piece of work that one, if you get him dodge.

Sincerely, The only bloke with the balls to throw his accounts on the line to point out riots bullshit.

replies.body:
You were testing the veracity of their banning system trying to test the theory that trolls dont get banned by announcing to the boards that you'd be trolling, and now that you're banned you're saying its ridiculous?

is it ridiculous though?

Is it?

Indeed it is ridiculous.

I got a near instant permaban for questioning their report system.

The account im trolling on however has yet to get more than a chat restriction.

Priorities are a little out of whack on that one.

Sounds alot like riot has a god complex and doesnt like being told their methods are shit.

Hey dude,

So yea we saw your post about creating accounts to intentionally troll to see if they get banned. We investigated your intents and found that this account, the one you're posting on, has been getting logged in to from all over the world.

So we locked it in order to protect it. If you want to ensure it is secure, please lodge a ticket to recover the account as at this point multiple people have access and the original owner needs to be proven so we can unlock it and ensure only they have access.

Regarding your intent to ruin other peoples' games, please don't. We do have multiple systems in place banning players every day for detections of leaving/afk, feeding, and verbal abuse and they're all listed [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Y9YJ60Fn-player-behaviour-faq).

Considering i leave my pc logged in with my league client open.

And the only time i see the league client give me a "its logged in somewhere else" message is when my net goes down due to telstra maintenance mid game and i reconnect on a different ip.

And i didn't receive any emails regarding such an issue.

Id be a little weary to believe thats what actually happened.

But uh, ill go along with your little shtick.

Also im aware of the systems existing, my common thread is that an automatic system is not an adequate replacement for human judgement.

To get an accurate system, you require unbiased opinions from a multi person jury so they can judge the case based on context rather than arbitrary system checks.

The easiest way to do this would to simply be, create an official replay service.

Attach a replay file to each tribunal case with all the usernames turned off and use champion names as references.

Reward players that successfully judge cases with tribunal points which go towards jury ranks, because doesn't matter if you are an autistic five year old or a 60 year old man, for some reason applying ranks to things and points motivates people to do shit.

Then you just need to keep leaverbuster for afk's and boom, you have a system that works, satiates the tribunal nay sayers like myself.

And makes it so literally no one has an excuse.

yeah they probs have time to browse boards and perma ban you instead of fixing the report system because its' OCE riot, who, my guess is, isn't involved that much in the whole report system, they just deal with people on OCE.

its funny because your "pointing out riots bullshit" has 0 impact on anything. if you want to try and make a difference, go post your shit on NA, not here.

fucking retard. goddamn.

I would.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/search?query=tribunal&content_type=discussion

But i dont have to, they already have enough people doing my work there as it is.

End of the day, riot sold out, they arent the same company i knew and loved back in 09.

Also compare that same search to this one http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/search?query=tribunal&application_id=PEr1qIcT&created_from=&rioter_post=1&content_type=discussion

the only post i could find from riot that was on a comment about the actual tribunal system in the last 2 years or so was this one.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/mEIlagLk-when-is-the-tribunal-coming-back?show=flat&page=2

Which had this riot post "We will be working on the voting system once we've finished up the new champ select."

This was 5 months ago.

They also originally said when they disabled the tribunal that they would be working on it to upgrade it.

That was 2 YEARS ago.

What have they actually acomplished in the last year and a half, aside from letting oce turn into a complete and total toxicity fest because we didnt have any report system until the automatic system was in place (riot did it all manually because they were too lazy to just fucking implement the tribunal system as it was at the time) and then putting in a system that has an accuracy rate lower than 20%?

Chroma packs.

And cs go chest clones.

Working report system? nah fuck that, we need more money first.
You sound pretty paranoid. Chillax and go play Smite or something. It'll be better for your health.
